examples.example: 我很尊重每个人不同的观点，因为这能让我们从多元角度去看待世界。

translate.english: I respect everyone's different viewpoints very much, because this can enable us to view the world from multiple perspectives.

examples.example: 我们应该以开放的心态去接纳不同的观点，这样才能不断进步。

translate.english: We should accept different views with an open mind so that we can make continuous progress.

examples.example: 我总是认真倾听他人的观点，从中汲取有益的部分来提升自己。

translate.english: I always listen carefully to others' viewpoints and draw the beneficial parts from them to improve myself.
